summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.5°C) and outside temperature (down 2.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5108 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12658 lux), cloud levels (up 1683 m), feels like temperature (up 5.4°C), and outside temperature (up 4.5°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 216.8m lower than yesterday, 1069.7m lower than past week, 1683.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1048.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2120m and 2730m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
